attributes.action: Add invertebrates such as snails and other molluscs to the animal welfare bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day all around the uk places such as brixton market sell snails and other invertebrates in apalling conditions, they are ill treated and underfed, and this needs to change! They are living beings and sentinent creatures with feelings and needs, they need looking after just like cats or dogs.
